articles.author: Joanna Ossinger
articles.title: Asian Stocks Climb as Fed Cut Bets Gain Momentum: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian stocks advanced and a gauge of global equities was on track for another record high on trade-deal optimism and increased expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.
articles.content:
Asian stocks advanced and a gauge of global equities was on track for another record high on trade-deal optimism and increased expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.
